product_name: ASUS P707 ROG Spatha X Dual-mode RGB Gaming Mouse

features.Connection Type: Play in wired or wireless modes

Connection Type: USB 2.0 ROG Paracord Type-C to USB cable
Others: Customizable ASUS Aura RGB LED lighting effects

description.title: ASUS P707 ROG Spatha X Dual-mode RGB Gaming Mouse
description.details: ASUS P707 ROG Spatha X is a Dual-mode RGB Gaming Mouse from ASUS. This wireless gaming mouse features dual-mode connectivity, allowing you to play wirelessly via RF 2.4 GHz or traditionally with a wired USB-CÂ® connection. A specially tuned 19,000 dpi sensor lets you take down opponents swiftly with extreme accuracy, while 12 programmable buttons ensure all commands are at your fingertips. In addition, ROG Spatha X features exclusive push-fit switch sockets, ROG Micro Switch, Aura Sync RGBs, and a magnetic charging dock.

description.title: Dual-Mode Connectivity with Ultimate Accuracy
description.details: This mouse has Dual-mode connectivity lets you play your way. ROG Spatha X utilizes an RF 2.4 GHz connection with high data throughput to ensure your commands are tracked accurately in-game. And once the battery runs out, just hook it up and continue the fight while charging, all without losing responsiveness and performance. A highly tuned 19,000 dpi optical sensor delivers unrivaled accuracy with a 400 IPS speed, and 50G acceleration.

description.title: Up to 12 Programmable Buttons
description.details: The 12 programmable buttons on ROG Spatha X put a myriad of commands in the palm of your hand, with six side buttons arranged to resemble the iconic ROG eye. The placement of each button has been carefully considered so theyâ€™re within reach, and all have been designed to provide a tactile click feel for intuitive, responsive control.

description.title: ROG Micro Switch
description.details: The ROG Micro Switch features a gold-plated electro-junction and a 70-million-click lifespan to improve durability and extend the lifespan of the mouse. Strict ROG manufacturing standards ensure that each mouse button keeps force deviation within +/- 5 gram-force for a consistent click feel.

description.title: Advanced Power Solution
description.details: ROG Spatha X offers phenomenal battery life, giving you up to 67 hours of playtime on a full charge. And if the battery does run low, just 15 minutes of charging via USB-C or the charging dock provides up to 12 hours of intense wireless gaming.

description.title: Exclusive Push-Fit Switch Socket with DPI On-The-Scroll
description.details: Exclusive push-fit switch sockets make it easy to drop in new switches; so you can tailor operating force and feedback to preference, or replace worn or broken switches. A unique DPI On-The-Scroll feature lets you easily adjust mouse sensitivity without accessing software. Just press and hold the DPI button for three seconds and then spin the scroll wheel and click the button again to set and save the sensitivity level. You can also just click the button to cycle through four different DPI levels.

description.title: ROG Paracord and Aura RGB Lighting
description.details: The extremely flexible and lightweight ROG Paracord is designed to minimize snags and maximize movement. The raised port of ROG Spatha X provides space between the cable and tabletop or mousepad surface, minimizing cable drag and noise. ROG Aura RGB lighting is integrated into the logo, the scroll wheel and side buttons of ROG Spatha X. Lighting can be customized with a near-endless spectrum of colors and a range of dynamic effects. In addition, up to five profiles can be stored onboard, so your preferences travel with you.

description.title: Armoury Crate
description.details: Armoury Crate is an enhanced driver-based, peripherals-configuration utility that offers extensive controls. An intuitive UI lets you easily tune ROG Spatha X to suit your gameplay style â€” adjust performance and surface calibration settings, program and map buttons, customize lighting effects, and more. You can even track hardware stats during gameplay for data analysis. ASUS P707 ROG Spatha X Dual-mode RGB Gaming Mouse offers 1 Year warranty.

product_name: Razer Viper 8KHz Ambidextrous Esports Gaming Mouse

Warranty Information.Warranty: 01 Year Warranty (Need to submit product box for warranty claim)

description.title: Razer Viper 8KHz Ambidextrous Esports Gaming Mouse
description.details: The Razer Viper 8KHz is an ambidextrous esports gaming mouse with a true 8000 Hz polling rate for the fastest speed and lowest latency ever achieved. Upgraded with 2nd-gen Razer Optical Switches, itâ€™s time to rise to the occasion and leave it all on the floor. Razer HyperPolling Technology surpasses the industry standard with a true 8000 Hz polling rateâ€” sending up to 8 times more data in a second and reducing delay from 1 to 1/8th of a millisecond. Unlike mice with lower polling rates where cursor movement can exhibit inconsistent micro-stutters, Razer HyperPolling Technology ensures ultra-smooth cursor movement in a difference thatâ€™s even more apparent on high refresh rate monitors. Improved with greater tactile feedback, every click now feels and sounds more satisfying. And with no need for a debounce delay used in traditional switches, this lightning-fast actuation is complemented by Razer HyperPolling Technology to provide the lowest input latency that gets you closer to playing like a pro. With an industry-leading 99.6% resolution accuracy, even the finest movement from this ambidextrous esports gaming mouse is tracked with consistency. Equipped with intelligent functions, the sensor becomes even more accurate, allowing for an acute level of precision for game-winning headshots. Enjoy faster and smoother control with one of the lightest gaming mice in the market. Weighing just 71g, whatâ€™s even more impressive is that it achieves its weight without compromising on the build strength of its ambidextrous form factor. Be ready to compete anywhere with up to 5 stored profiles that give you access to optimal key binds, macros, and twice the inputs via the Razer HyperShift function. This latest Razer Viper 8KHz Ambidextrous Esports Gaming Mouse has 01 Year Warranty (Need to submit product box for warranty claim).
